original_text: I do not want to hurt any of my Christian friends. So, if the food that I eat causes them to do something wrong, I will never eat meat again.
korean_text: 그러므로 만일 음식이 내 형제를 실족하게 한다면 나는 영원히 고기를 먹지 아니하여 내 형제를 실족하지 않게 하리라

sentences.original_text: I do not want to hurt
So, if the food that I eat
causes them to do something wrong,
I will never eat meat again.
